###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlMonthCal_HitTest

###Description###
Determines which portion of a month calendar control is at a given point

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiMonthCal.au3>
_GUICtrlMonthCal_HitTest($hWnd, $iX, $iY)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to control
$iX
	X position to test
$iY
	Y position to test
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: $tagMCHITTESTINFO structure

###Remarks###
None.

$tagMCHITTESTINFO
